author: Breitbart London
description: PARIS (AP) — France’s new president is hosting the International Olympic Committee to try to boost Paris’ bid to beat out Los Angeles in the heated race for the 2024 Games.
title: New French President Pushes Paris Olympic Bid, Forms Government

author: Sean Moran
description: The Competitive Enterprise Institute (CEI) launched an ad campaign urging President Trump to withdraw from the Paris climate agreement.
title: Ad Urges Trump to Keep Promise, Exit Paris Climate Agreement

author: BBC Sport
description: Julian Draxler says Germany team-mate Mesut Ozil should leave Arsenal and join him at Paris St-Germain.
title: Mesut Ozil: Arsenal midfielder should join Paris St-Germain - Julian Draxler

author: Reuters Editorial
description: French president Emmanuel Macron will travel to Lausanne in July to defend the Paris 2024 Olympic bid at the International Olympic Committee (IOC), bid sources told Reuters on Tuesday.
title: Olympics: French president Macron to defend Paris bid in Lausanne

author: BBC Sport
description: Paris Mayor Anne Hidalgo and LA 2024 Chairman Casey Wasserman tell BBC Sport's Dan Roan whether they would be happy to host the 2028 Summer Olympic Games if the 2024 event was awarded to their rival.
title: Paris v LA in Olympic bid - would loser in 2024 vote accept 2028 Games?

description: Gutachter des Internationalen Olympischen Komitees (IOC) sprechen der Olympia-Bewerbung von Paris großes Lob aus.
title: Olympia: IOC lobt Pariser Olympia-Bewerbung

description: Nach dem Abschluss der Vorrundenphase stehen bei der Eishockey-Weltmeisterschaft in Köln und Paris alle Viertelfinalpartien fest.
title: Eishockey: Russland trifft auf Tschechien, USA auf Finnland

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Chelsea offered £55m (€64m) to bring Marco Verratti from Paris Saint-Germain, but the Italy star is also wanted by Juventus, Inter and Milan.
title: Chelsea bid €64m for Verratti

author: FourFourTwo
description: AC Milan great Paolo Maldini has spoken in glowing terms about Gianluigi Donnarumma and Paris Saint-Germain star Marco Verratti.
title: Donnarumma a once-in-20-years talent, says AC Milan great Maldini

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Inter are offering Ivan Perisic to Paris Saint-Germain, Manchester United and Tottenham Hotspur, but want at least €50m (£43m).
title: PSG join Perisic race
